website_summaries.verdict: A nice (but expensive) laptop that delivers excellent power.
pros: This model has a cutting edge graphics card with 8GB of dedicated graphics RAM, so it’s ready for virtual reality gaming
Ships with 32GB of RAM, and you can easily add more
cons: Has a 512GB hard drive, but you may want more storage space

customer_reviews.title: Battery life normal uses about 3 to 4hrs
customer_reviews.text: Super happy, I like mobility On this laptop is The best it work every single penny, gaming is excellent, you will need a cooling pad , no problem running all games in ultra video settings
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Machine!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is Amazing! Ran Fortnite at max all settings at an average of 160 FPS. It also is great for working on school projects. I am really grateful for Amazon shipping this product quickly and it came in perfect condition. I am all around impressed with the quality of the laptop for the price. Thank you so much Amazon and thanks HP for an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Eric King

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising/deceptive pictures and descriptions
customer_reviews.text: Omen Commend Center: A) in the picture and descriptions it says you can customize keyboard backlighting, which is not technically wrong, you can turn the keyboard lights on or off...however the picture shows multiple colors...also in another picture it mentions you can customize exterior or interior RGB lighting or create your own effects - can’t do that B) in the picture you can see “overclocking” as An option, not true with this model Nividia RTx: I’m my other picture you can see that Nividia Max Q is not included, that’s not true, it is included
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it means business and it delivers.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing about this laptop that I really don't like. It looks good. It has a lighted keyboard that feels good and works very well. This laptop loads Youtube videos very quickly, the videos start playing as soon as you lift your finger off the touch pad. This is a gaming computer; however, I don't play games on it. I am a machinist and I use this laptop with CAM machining programs and it renders solid models and machining tool paths very quickly. The touch pad and its keys work well, very responsive and accurate. All and all this is a very nice laptop that I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BlackHeartArt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing best computer ive ever had.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop tends to run really hot. The highest I have seen the temp for the CPU was 200 Fahrenheit and the GPU was 150 Fahrenheit. I would highly recommend having a cooling pad when you're running the computer at high temps. Otherwise, it is an amazing computer that I would highly recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Pintner

customer_reviews.title: Misleading, noisy but value for money
customer_reviews.text: Pros Very good value for money. It's was actually a steal. ( I got it for dirt cheap Price) Specs are really good. No upgrade necessary for most of us. Thunderbolt 3 is present at this price range. 200w power adapter is sleek. Ports are well aligned. Cons It is 2070 max Q design not full 2070 as advertised Fans are noisy It heats up quickly Bloatware - lots of HP and Microsoft unwanted softwares. Trackpad works but is outdated design and not intuitive. Loves fingerprint. Note : my device computer name was already named. So the laptop must have been opened and used before I brought. But the ad says it's new and not refurbished. .
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Defective After Two Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Graphics and user ability are pretty incredible minus the fans blowing louder than my white noise machine. While running, this laptop could heat a small apartment. After taking extreme precaution 24/7 with this laptop around the two week mark, the monitor decided to black out. Not sure if it was CPU, GPU or what on the motherboard crashed, but I have not been this disappointed in a while. The last Omen laptop I purchased STILL RUNS and it was purchased 4 YEARS AGO. Yeah, that comparison alone hits home for me. 2/5 stars
customer_reviews.author: bryaniot

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. This is a Max-Q GPU. Over and over again this is advertised as not being Max-Q. From the pictures to the responses to questions. I hate a liar and this will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great performance, and nicely put together! Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming laptop. And it certainly runs *very* hot. So make sure you use a tool to reduce the voltage slightly, and if your game doesn't really need it, you can also disable turbo. I will be buying a laptop cooler, but these are normally common issues with gaming laptops in general. Love the screen, and the plethora of connectivity options. Overall, love the thing for the Destiny 2 game! Wish it had more than a 512GB NVME drive. But you can pickup an affordable 1TB SSD to store your Steam games. Or just back them up to your NAS, or setup a caching server for Steam, etc.
customer_reviews.author: FY

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop fairly recently. Everything else around it had either half the ram or a weaker graphics card. As long as it's plugged in it operates amazingly. As a mobile work station it really suits all my needs. When I get the time I can play games too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool but hot
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing gaming laptop, however, there’s a few things you need to know before buy it, this model don’t have a keyboard light system, keys are just red without backlight, and the battery life is short, very short, just 4 hours of a normal use, and 2 and half hours of gaming performance, but that’s normal in this kind of devices, and also gets hot like hell, so I recommend to use a external Cooler Cooling Pad system, but still, is a very powerful machine, looks pretty awesome and the price is amazing so I recommend to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Dont ever buy an HP product
customer_reviews.text: Seriously I hate hp products. Every single hp computer I ever bought has had issues. If you see this brand just stay away from it. You have to tweak the settings just to get this laptop to work after a certain update. This laptop also freezes way more than it should. I ran a cpu temp monitor and I keep getting overheating warning signs when I am running basic games. Don't ever buy hp products seriously!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke down within days of use
customer_reviews.text: This product broke down and degraded its performance drastically within days in response to basic usage and gaming well under recommended specifications. Although at first it appeared to be good value for the money, I need a computer that will last me for years, not degrade immediately. Edit: Although I had an initial problem this product, a system reset was able to restore it to normal. Although I'm not entirely happy that it had a problem soon after purchasing, it returned to 100% quickly after the reset, and I haven't had any issues since. Overall, despite a hiccup, a good product value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: "An NVIDIA Graphics Card was not detected in your system."
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has given me way too much trouble with laggy gameplay. Now apparently the graphics card isn't detected? I'm going to try returning this now. Don't recommend. EDIT: It started working again after I messed around with it...works fine now. Gameplay doesn't seem to be laggy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: This is really a rip off. I personally purchased this laptop specifically because it was advertised as a RTX 2070 NON MAX-Q. Upon receiving this i open device manager and NVIDIA control panel to find out that this is indeed a MAX-Q version of the RTX 2070. Pissed off customer i am.
customer_reviews.author: Ika stillo

customer_reviews.title: Max-Q inside
customer_reviews.text: This would’ve been a five star laptop if not for the Max-Q GPU. All other specifications as advertised are accurate. Still, this is so far the best value for the money laptop purchase at Amazon and I’ve purchased four in less than two years. I looked into the “missing” GPU issue as other reviews mentioned, and it is caused by Windows updates. Roll back the faulty updated driver from the devices list in control panel, and the GPU should be detected again.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Defective On Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The battery wouldn't last for even an hour on, but idle. Returned it. A laptop that can't even last an hour without being plugged in can barely be called a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great, but faulty
customer_reviews.text: Performance of the computer was excellent while it still operated properly. Issues with blue screen crashing began 3 days after I received the computer. Faulty connections to blame for the issues, as the software was having trouble recognition the hard drive and gpu. Overall, great computer if it doesn’t have inherent hardware faults.
customer_reviews.author: Easton

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good computer for gaming. The graphics are great and the FPS is really high.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth reilly

customer_reviews.title: This is a great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is a very cool looking with amazing specs. I run all games at 100+fps on ultra and sometimes for games like rainbow six run at 2k 80fps. Battery life is 4-5 hours browsing internet doing assingments listening to music on youtube. This is a great deal i recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It gets hot pretty quick but a good computer stand with a fan will be fine!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: the fans run most of the time battery is at 40% after web browsing for an hour feels flimsy and the case marks very easily usual windows driver problems keyboard backlight usually doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Bluebly

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Overheats in games like GTA. Likes to overheat on High settings.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Nogat

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time the computer made a black screen when starting, unable to sign in or do anything. Really disappointed. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Emiliano R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for solidworks, matlab, and gaming
customer_reviews.text: An expensive laptop but worth the price. Only comment is that it heats up a lot when playing games on ultra setting
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: Most bang for the buck in a gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great specs at a great price. Would definitely recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Richard N Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend getting this started having issues after 6 months of use such as Overheating and shutting down randomly
customer_reviews.author: Xin M.

customer_reviews.title: 2000 for this?
customer_reviews.text: Going to keep this quick and simple. 2000 bucks for this? Do I even need to say how unworthy this piece of crap is of 2000 dollars? Do not buy this. It's not even using the latest generation hardware. It's a laptop (There are no gaming laptops, btw. These things are just incapable desktops that you can move from wall to another. Which you will be because the batteries are garbage and you'll get 45 minutes of playtime, if that.) Please, just do yourself a favor and laugh and move on.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Sleek
customer_reviews.text: With a price comparable to a MacBook, I had pretty high hopes when getting this laptop. It has definitely fulfilled my requirements thus far - and I've had it for several months now. It has great processing power and everything is laid out really nicely for gaming or whatever else you'd like to use it for. The fan is a bit loud, but that was basically to be expected. I have not had any issues with overheating - and I press it pretty hard regularly. It's well-made and durable. A solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Jessi

product_meta.title: Omen by HP 2019 15-Inch Gaming Laptop, Intel i7-9750H Processor, GeForce RTX 2070 8 GB, 32 GB RAM, 512 GB SSD, VR Ready, Windows 10 Home (15-dc1047nr, Black)
product_meta.description:
Capacity:15-15.99 inchesYou've got places to go, plays to make, and power to proclaim. With the OMEN 15 Laptop, you can play at your best from anywhere—without sacrificing performance. Keep moving and improving your skills on a compact, portable rig designed to deliver desktop-class graphics performance, total immersion, and easy upgradability.

The OMEN 15 Laptop is geared for easy upgrades and maintenance with single panel access to 512 GB PCle(R) NVMe(TM) Solid State Drive, and 32 GB of RAM. Plus, take advantage of a generous port selection for your favorite accessories and external displays.

- By producing authentic, spatially accurate 3D sound through any headphones or earbuds, this technology gives games, movies, and music a level of depth and immersion for the best entertainment experience possible. 
- Quickly access your PC’s internals with the large, single panel on the bottom of the laptop. Held on by only a few screws, it’s easily removable for upgrading or maintenance.
- It’s never been easier to give your device a bigger or second display. With HDMI output you can transmit HD video and sound with just one standard cable. Get all the benefits of the robust DisplayPort on your most portable devices. Transmit audio and up to 4K video in stunning quality.
- Now you can easily play PC games on your big screen TV with OMEN Game Stream—a free remote gaming service that lets you stream from your OMEN PC to other Windows 10 PCs.
- Breakthrough graphics performance powered by the ultra-speedy GDDR6 technology, allowing you to stream and game smoothly with NVIDIA GeForce Experience and GameReady.
- Get lost in an immersive narrow bezel FHD display with breathtaking resolution. A 2-zone dragon red backlit keyboard with 26-key rollover is strategically designed to accelerate your gaming reflexes.
feature_bullets: Hyper-realistic Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 (8 GB GDDR5 dedicated). enjoy new levels of gaming realism and performance with real-time ray-tracing technologies. Vr/mr ready. 15.6-Inch diagonal FHD IPS Anti-Glare micro-edge WLED-backlit Display (1920 x 1080) with 144Hz refresh rate
Cutting-edge gaming performance: play The latest games, including Fortnight, PUBG, and Overwatch, from anywhere—without sacrificing performance
Omen command center: easily turn up your performance with included software that enables control over your CPU overclocking settings and prioritizes your gaming traffic to minimize latency
Super Fast Processor: 9th Generation intel(r) core(tm) i7-9750h Processor, 6-Core, 2.6GHz up to 4.5GHz for superior gaming performance

Memory and storage: 32 GB DDR4-2666 SDRAM (upgradable with 2 accessible Memory Slots) and Fast boot-up, file transfer and a snappier experience with the internal 512 GB pcie(r) nvme(tm) M.2 Solid State Drive
Bios recovery and protection: automatically checks the health of your PC, protects against unauthorized access, secures local storage and recovers itself from boot-up issues

Ports: headphone/Microphone combo, Microphone jack, 2 USB 3.1 Gen 1 (side), 1 RJ-45 (rear), 1 USB 3.1 Gen 1 (rear), 1 HDMI 2.0 (rear), 1 Mini displayport(tm) (rear), 1 USB 3.1 Type-C(tm) (rear), 1 media card Reader
Battery life: up to 4 hours and 30 minutes (mixed usage); up to 4 hours (video playback); up to 2 hours and 45 minutes (wireless streaming)
Dimensions AND weight (unpackaged): 14.17 inches (W) x 10.35 inches (D) x 0.98 inch (H); 5.12 pounds
Operating System and Warranty: Windows 10 Home and 1-Year Limited hardware warranty with 24-hour, 7 days a week Web support
